item.title: Recycle Your Old iPhone For Cash
item.description:
The release of the new iPhone 3G is approaching, and early adopters and tech enthusiasts are eager to get their hands on it. The enhanced features, including faster data speeds, GPS, and expanded application support, make it a significant upgrade. However, the cost of upgrading from the first-generation iPhone is a concern for many. Recent reports suggest that AT&T will offer a trade-in program for iPhones purchased after May 27th in pristine condition...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/recycle-your-old-iphone-for-cash/

item.title: Youâ€™re Not Throwing Out That Cell Phone, Are You?
item.description:
Seriously, don’t even think about throwing away that old cell phone, especially with the economy the way it is. It might not make calls anymore, but it’s still worth money. You wouldn’t throw cash in the trash, would you? People trash millions of dollars worth of old electronics every year because they don’t realize their value. Selling it yourself seems like a hassle, but it can be easy! Some phones, especially smartphones, are worth a significant amount of money...
